statements: UPDATE Robo_Advisors SET asset_allocation = '{"stocks": 60, "bonds": 30, "cash": 10}', portfolio_performance = '{"returns": 12.5, "risk": 8.2}' WHERE advisor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE Robo_Advisors SET portfolio_performance = '{"returns": 14.2, "risk": 7.9}', asset_allocation = '{"stocks": 50, "bonds": 40, "cash": 10}' WHERE advisor_id = '456e7890-f12c-45a6-bcde-789012345678';
UPDATE Robo_Advisors SET asset_allocation = '{"stocks": 0.6, "bonds": 0.4}' WHERE advisor_id = '8e973f31-98c2-4c18-b45b-0324cd45ad92';
UPDATE Robo_Advisors SET portfolio_performance = '{"annual_return": 0.08, "volatility": 0.15}' WHERE client_id = 'ed4250b2-9f67-44ae-b99d-4f7ea414f7b5';
UPDATE robo_advisors SET risk_tolerance = 'low' WHERE client_id = 101;
UPDATE portfolio SET performance = 0.75, allocation = 0.25 WHERE portfolio_id = 201;
UPDATE robo_advisors SET total_assets = 500000.00, client_name = 'John Doe' WHERE client_id = 101
UPDATE portfolio SET allocation = 60.50, performance = 12.75 WHERE portfolio_id = 201
UPDATE ClientPortfolio SET portfolio_name = 'New Portfolio', total_assets = 15000.00 WHERE client_id = 123;
UPDATE AssetClass SET asset_category = 'Fixed Income', benchmark = 'Barclays Aggregate' WHERE asset_id = 456;
UPDATE ClientPortfolio SET total_assets = total_assets + 5000, allocation = '2022-10-15' WHERE client_id = 101
UPDATE PortfolioPerformance SET net_asset_value = 75000.25, returns = 8.6 WHERE portfolio_id = 201
UPDATE clients SET client_name = 'John Doe' WHERE client_id = '9cb0a92a-8a33-4ba2-828c-d55320793007';
UPDATE portfolios SET total_value = 5000.00 WHERE client_id = '9cb0a92a-8a33-4ba2-828c-d55320793007';
UPDATE clients SET client_name = 'John Doe', client_email = 'john@example.com' WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE assets SET asset_value = 7500.50, asset_name = 'Updated Asset' WHERE asset_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE RoboAdvisors SET name = 'New Name' WHERE advisor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Assets SET value = 1500.75, name = 'Updated Asset' WHERE asset_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE RoboAdvisors SET name = 'NewName', company = 'NewCompany' WHERE advisor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Clients SET name = 'UpdatedClientName', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE client_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
